name: blip
description: Blip is a web app for type 1 diabetes (T1D) built on top of the [Tidepool](http://tidepool.org/) platform.

scripts.test: TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' karma --single-run --log-level debug start
scripts.test-debug: TZ=UTC NODE_ENV='test' DEBUG_UNIT_TEST='true' NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' karma --single-run=false --log-level debug start --auto-watch
